definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Do not feed macaques and wild animals.
sentences.chinese: 请勿喂食猕猴及其它野生动物。

sentences.english: When you do, be prepared for some intensive wildlife bingo.
sentences.chinese: 如果你来这里旅行，请注意野生动物密集的区域。

sentences.english: It has transparent cover which allows the kids to see the sea wild life.
sentences.chinese: 它有透明盖，让孩子们看海野生动物。

sentences.english: Eating wild animal, to maintain ecological balance.
sentences.chinese: 拒食野生动物，维护生态平衡。

sentences.english: You can just imagine how fierce the wild animals can be.
sentences.chinese: 你可以想象一下野生动物是多么的凶猛。

sentences.english: Finally those who hunt them must be punished severely.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对涌锒猎珍稀野生动物的人必须严惩。

sentences.english: West Sichuan is region abundant in wildlife .
sentences.chinese: 川西是野生动物丰富的地区。

sentences.english: In a cold winter, wild animals may die from lack of food.
sentences.chinese: 在严寒的冬天，野生动物会由于缺乏食物而死亡。

sentences.english: To protect birds and wild animal.
sentences.chinese: 保护鸟类保护野生动物人人有责。

sentences.english: Because of the wildlife project, the number of milu deer has increased.
sentences.chinese: 由于这项野生动物保护工程，麋鹿的数量已经增加了。

sentences.english: Teeming with wildlife, the park was a good place to nature-watch.
sentences.chinese: 那座公园野生动物遍布，是个观赏大自然的好地方。

sentences.english: It is a common tort for wild animals causing damage to the residents in edge-forest areas.
sentences.chinese: 野生动物损害林缘区居民利益是一种常见的侵权现象。

sentences.english: How can infrastructure be designed to be wildlife-friendly?
sentences.chinese: 我们应该如何设计出对野生动物友好的基础设施呢？

sentences.english: In my point of view, the wild animals were protected effectively still has a long way to go.
sentences.chinese: 在我看来，要有效地保护野生动物，还任重道远。

sentences.english: Finally， those who hunter them must be punished severely.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对于捕猎珍稀野生动物的人必须严惩。

sentences.english: And also you have a chance to see fish and other wildlife in the water.
sentences.chinese: 你也有机会见到海里的鱼儿和其他野生动物。

definition: (bird species of China) great bustard (Otis tarda)
